```{r}
banks <- readLines("Advent3.txt")

max_joltage <- function(s) {
  digits <- as.integer(strsplit(s, "")[[1]])
  n <- length(digits)
  best <- -Inf

  for (i in 1:(n-1)) {
    for (j in (i+1):n) {
      val <- digits[i] * 10 + digits[j]
      if (val > best) best <- val
    }
  }
  
  return(best)
}

bank_values <- sapply(banks, max_joltage)

sum(bank_values)

```
